description.value: Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects. You gain @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Invisibility]{Invisibility} and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Misdirection]{Misdirection} as 2nd-level innate occult spells. You can target only yourself with invisibility, and you must be the primary target of misdirection. You can cast each spell once per day.
